comments.body: Because I'm generally a Linux admin. This and the win_robocopy module are pretty much the only powershell I've written. If there's a better way to do anything in this module please go for it. My only reasoning for not doing it that way to begin with was ignorance.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +35,39 @@$method = Get-AnsibleParam -obj $params "method" -type "string" -default "GET" -validateset "GET","POST","PUT","HEAD","DELETE","OPTIONS","PATCH","TRACE","CONNECT","REFRESH"
$content_type = Get-AnsibleParam -obj $params -name "content_type" -type "string"
# TODO: Why is this not a normal dictionary ?
$headers = Get-AnsibleParam -obj $params -name "headers" -type "string"
# TODO: Why is this not a normal dictionary ?
